p: Ketamine-anesthetized mice were intranasally inoculated with formaldehyde-inactivated PR8, live PR8, FluMist Â®, or rAdH5/M2e virus. The vaccine doses are specified in the figure legends. For lethal challenge infection, anesthetized mice were intranasally inoculated with 5LD 50 of mouse-adapted A/PR/8/34 (PR8) (H1N1) or A/Aquatic bird/Korea/W81/2005 (H5N2) viruses.
